item.title: [z508] Removing administrators options [z508]
item.dc:creator: @iobpkbarrage iobpkbarrage
item.description:
@iobpkbarrage wrote:

Hello everyone, I am not new in moparscape, but never posted before.
Don’t be harsh with this tutorial because it my first topic and post.
I noticed for a while that alot people looking how to change administrators combat in z508.
A bit of explain: This tutorial will make you able to to change the administrators combat, like a player and delete trade. I’m a 508+ coder section, I can code loads of stuffs, Just wanted release something easy, because I’m first time poster, as the time will past, I’ll make better tutorials.
Just wanted released it because it easy, fast and help others.

Time: 1 minute.
Difficult is 0\10.

Chapter one - Allowing Administrators to trade normal players.

Open Codeusa - Model - Ptrade - Then enter the “Ptrade” class.

Search for:

if (p.rights >= 2 && tp.rights < 2) {

Now replace this:

if (p.rights >= 2 && tp.rights < 2) {

With this:

if (p.rights >= 2 && tp.rights < 0) {

Now under this you will see:

p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Administrators cannot trade normal players."); return; }

Delete this:

p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Administrators cannot trade normal players."); return; }

Now your code should look like this:

[code]}

public void tradePlayer(Player tp) {
if (p.rights >= 2 && tp.rights < 0) {

[/code]

Chapter two - Allowing Administrators to have their orginal Combat Levels.

Open up Codeusa - Update - Then enter the “PlayerUpdateMasks” class.

Now search for:

if (p.rights >= 2) {

And under it, delete this:

combat = 0;

Thank you for your time.
This was a lil tutorial that was request =].

Be love, Iobpkbarrage (break).

Read full topic
